/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC   -O3 -DNDEBUG  -Wl,--no-undefined -lc    -shared -Wl,-soname,libvtkCommonColor-7.1.so.1 -o ../../lib/libvtkCommonColor-7.1.so.1 CMakeFiles/vtkCommonColor.dir/vtkColorSeries.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonColor.dir/vtkNamedColors.cxx.o ../../lib/libvtkCommonCore-7.1.so.1 ../../lib/libvtkCommonDataModel-7.1.so.1 ../../lib/libvtkCommonTransforms-7.1.so.1 ../../lib/libvtkCommonMath-7.1.so.1 ../../lib/libvtkCommonCore-7.1.so.1 -Wl,-rpath,/home/mike/PCL-Tests/meshGeneration/vtk/VTK-build/VTK-Release-build/lib: -Wl,-rpath-link,/home/mike/PCL-Tests/meshGeneration/vtk/VTK-build/VTK-Release-build/lib
